title: This Kodak Film and Slide Scanner Is $170 Right Now
description:
The Kodak Slide N Scan makes preserving old photos incredibly easy, and it’s on sale right now for $169.97 with coupon code KODAK. It lets you view and edit both color and black and white negatives (135, 110, and 126 mm film sizes), as well as 35 and 50mm slides with the cardboard frames, and then convert them into…

title: You Can Now Chat With One of Meta’s Horrifying AI Personas
description:
